sub_title: Supply Chain and Forecasting Expertise | American Expat in the Netherlands
summary:
Hello! I am a dedicated supply chain professional with a passion for forecasting, demand planning, and S&OP optimization. My resume contains ample experience in multiple industries - Medical Device, Technology, Aerospace - because I love to explore the intricacies of different global supply chains. My main goal at every company is to continuously learn and have a positive impact on the world through my role.  

I recently became an American expat living in the Netherlands with a legal right to work in the EU (no sponsorship required). While I currently have elementary level communication skills in Dutch, I am actively in language courses to quickly increase my proficiency.
